meanings.definition: The act of joining or uniting closely
meanings.sent1: The inosculations of the puzzle pieces created a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent2: The inosculations of the vines formed a dense canopy in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The inosculations of the roads in the city made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent4: The inosculations of the branches in the tree resembled a woven basket.
meanings.sent5: The inosculations of the threads in the fabric were seamless and strong.

meanings.sent1: The inosculations of the rivers created a harmonious flow.
meanings.sent2: The inosculations of the roots formed a network underground.
meanings.sent3: The inosculations of the train tracks made for a smooth ride.
meanings.sent4: The inosculations of the clouds in the sky painted a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The inosculations of the thoughts in his mind led to a brilliant idea.

meanings.definition: A connection or junction between two things, especially blood vessels
meanings.sent1: The inosculations of the blood vessels ensured proper circulation.
meanings.sent2: The inosculations of the wires provided electricity to the entire building.
meanings.sent3: The inosculations of the highways reduced traffic congestion.
meanings.sent4: The inosculations of the pipes in the plumbing system prevented leaks.
meanings.sent5: The inosculations of the relationships in the community strengthened bonds.
